dmca.title: No teacher headshots
dmca.body:
It has been brought to our attention that there are at least 116 photographs exhibited on a website known as www.webshots.com which appear to be traceable to your site in which you have displayed images of teachers at Morristown high School onto other forms and bodies in a very disparaging and disrespectful manner.  You have further exhibited pictures of students onto the website without permission from anyone.  As a result you have violated a number of privacy rights and laws of both the US and the State of indiana which could result in serious consequences for you.
   As the attorney for shelby eastern schools and the fact that these photographs appeared on computers at shelby eastern schools, i Hearby demand you cease and desist in your conduct and you immediately cause the exhibited photographs and pictiures to be removed form the website.  The failure to do so will result in further action being taken against you.
